channel.title: TriBirdScape Devo Team [Epic] [317] [pi]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/282hkht.png[/img] Hello and welcome to TriBirdScape Development Team Topic. Well ive been working on this project for almost a week. I was planning no realsing it but i was like nah so instead im turning this into a server and im looking for a great team. what i need is a great Hoster and some mods+Beta Testers. Hoster Applaction:
Name: Age: Skype?:[Optional] Email: Experince: Extra: Active:
Beta Tester: [code] Name: Email: Active: Extra [/code] Mod: [code] Name: Skype:[optional] Email: Active: Extra [/code] Current Staff: [code] Coder 1/1 WebMaster 1/1 Hoster 0/1 Betatest 0/3 [/code] Features: [b]Working on hudge list as we speak LOL[/b] Pictures: [img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/7501/e23616c4ca5e41969218b45.png[/img] [img]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/5462/3e4585c49c8a4f45a01f1f0.png[/img] [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/4214/b96f2b9ca76849e8824d83b.png[/img] [img]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/1913/996f1272e39346e495c187b.png[/img] [img]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/1724/7a5d084db3b74a449cebed8.png[/img] [img]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/6029/04deefb3701943669af6672.png[/img] [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/7484/e23a4016f5f44c7f8bae8e1.png[/img] [img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/3900/c2b1bf85dea34ccd927e4d5.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/4601/6b06198a4b2146bbb279ec2.png[/img] [img]http://img705.imageshack.us/img705/8379/e4720b55112a473384716dd.png[/img] [img]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/7085/f723ea23b5d149a990cf477.png[/img] [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/4315/6d66454757ac4d0b9f639a2.png[/img] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/5103/59a8f9672ad94cee83a3bc6.png[/img] [img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/5189/e3978afec79644f28954509.png[/img] Added: 7/16/2012 [img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/1579/88bb7b0709014190aa1ea7b.png[/img] Added: 7/16/2012 Task System: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uZJe5pTZrjA&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] Added: 7/16/2012 Boss kill counter: [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/596/2aa7b4da76c6445cbae84fc.png[/img] Added CurseofCanifis: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tMHkN4jaDDE&feature=youtu.be [/youtube] Videos: Switching: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ekCeQgoTIc&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] MultiBarrage: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_86m9xn9AUw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [b][Yes i know some pictures say "ForBidX" it was going to be original name xD][/b]
